title: The Easiest Way to Install Apps on a Vizio Smart TV

steps.title: Press the "input" button on your remote and select SmartCast.
steps.content: Press the "input" button on your remote and select SmartCast . Alternatively, press the "V" or the "Home" key to open your Vizio TV's main screen. The buttons you have on your remote depend on your model of TV. Unlike other smart TVs, you don't need to install apps with SmartCastâ€”they're all there waiting to be streamed. This means you won't be able to install any apps you can't find in SmartCast. Fortunately, plenty of apps are available. Make sure your Vizio TV is connected to the Internet. You can also connect to Wi-Fi without a remote .

steps.title: Press the left arrow on your remote.
steps.content: Press the left arrow on your remote. You'll navigate to the left, opening a menu from the left side of your screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and select Apps.
steps.content: Scroll down and select Apps . You need to press the "Down" arrow on your remote to navigate down.

steps.title: Search for an app.
steps.content: Search for an app. Scroll through this list to find the app you're looking for. You can see a list of all the available apps on Vizio's support page . SmartCast has a ton of apps and popular channels, including Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Apple TV+, Disney+, YouTube, TikTok, Fox Now, Peacock, CBS Sports, ESPN, the Food Network, HGTV, and the C.W. If you can't find the app you're looking for, like Spectrum's bundle of apps, you can't install it on your TV. Instead, you can install the app on your phone or tablet and use Chromecast or AirPlay to watch it on your Vizio TV. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select an app to add it to your favorites.
steps.content: Select an app to add it to your favorites. While you can easily find all the available apps from this screen, you can also add it to the most-used section of your Home screen to access it quickly.

steps.title: Press the V button on your remote.
steps.content: Press the V button on your remote. This will open the "Apps" menu. Keep in mind that your television must be connected to the Internet to download apps. You can also connect to Wi-Fi without a remote . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select an app category.
steps.content: Select an app category. You'll see multiple tabs with category names (like Featured and Latest ) at the top of the screen; selecting a category will let you view the apps within that category.

steps.title: Select an app you wish to download.
steps.content: Select an app you wish to download. Doing so will take you to the app's page. If you have a VIA+ (Vizio Internet Apps Plus) system, press and hold OK on the app until it's added to "My apps."

steps.title: Select Install.
steps.content: Select Install . This button is just below the app's title on the left side of your screen. [4] X Research source Once the app is added, you can see it from your Home screen.
